definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: We saw a film yesterday. Its name was Speed.
sentences.chinese: 我們昨天看了一場電影，片名是《生死時速》。

sentences.english: Regardless of the translator adopts what law, translates the ideal film title as far as possible.
sentences.chinese: 譯者無論採取何法，儘可能翻譯出理想的片名。

sentences.english: The title refers to one of Taipei oldest areas.
sentences.chinese: 電影片名“艋舺”取自臺北一個古老城區的名字。

sentences.english: The title comes from an address she gave at Yale in which she spoke of the  monument design process.
sentences.chinese: 片名取自她在耶魯的一次關於紀念碑設計流程的演說。

sentences.english: So here comes The Third Man.
sentences.chinese: 所以片名原文才取作，“第三人。

sentences.english: He’s won a number of awards, and has designed numerous film titles.
sentences.chinese: 多次獲獎，併爲多部電影設計片名。

sentences.english: This program's temporary name is "Face to Face with Morocco".
sentences.chinese: 片名暫定爲《與摩洛哥面對面》。

sentences.english: Her new record is onthe jiffy label.
sentences.chinese: 她的新錄的唱片名爲“瞬間”。

sentences.english: The new Superman movie has no title or release date yet.
sentences.chinese: 電影新“超人”尚未確定片名及上映日期。

sentences.english: Did you have the title in your head the whole time?
sentences.chinese: 片名一直在你腦海裏嗎？

sentences.english: The title refers to one of Taipei's oldest areas.
sentences.chinese: 電影片名“艋舺”取自臺北一個古老城區的名字。

sentences.english: Film names reflect the contents of films.
sentences.chinese: 電影片名好比影片的門楣。

definition: opening titles (of movie)/leader (blank film at the beginning and end of a reel)
